message.name: ERR_VIEW_SERVICEPLAN_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to view this approval request.

message.name: ERR_UPDATE_SERVICEPLAN_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to update this approval request.

message.name: ERR_SUBMIT_SERVICEPLAN_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to submit this plan item for approval

message.name: ERR_SUBMIT_PARTICIPANT_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to submit this plan item for approval

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_PARTICIPANT_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to approve this plan item

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_SERVICEPLAN_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to approve this service plan

message.name: ERR_REJECT_SERVICEPLAN_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to reject this service plan

message.name: ERR_REJECT_PARTICIPANT_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to reject this plan item

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_NOT_UNAPPROVED_NO_SUBMIT
message.locale: This plan item may not be submitted for approval as the plan item status is not Unapproved.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_NOT_SUBMITTED_NO_APPROVE
message.locale: This plan item may not be approved as the plan item has not been submitted for approval.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_NOT_SUBMITTED_NO_REJECT
message.locale: The plan item cannot be rejected as the plan item status is not submitted.

message.name: ERR_APPROVAL_NOT_REJECTED
message.locale: This approval request may not be modified. Only rejected approval requests may be modified.

message.name: ERR_PLANNED_ITEM_CONCERNING_NOT_PRESENT
message.locale: A concerning participant must be added to a plan item before the plan item can be approved.

message.name: ERR_PLANNED_ITEM_ALREADY_IN_APPROVAL_PROCESS
message.locale: The planned item cannot be manually approved as it is currently in the approval process

message.name: INF_PLANNED_ITEM_ALREADY_IN_APPROVAL_PROCESS
message.locale: This plan item is currently in the approval process.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_APPROVED
message.locale: This planned item has already been approved.
This planned item has already been approved.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_PLAN_ITEM_XRV_IN_APPROVAL_PROCESS_NO_REJECT
message.locale: The plan item cannot be rejected as the plan item is currently in the approval process.
